text: Neostenanthera hamata is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is found in Ivory Coast, Ghana, Liberia, and Sierra Leone. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Hawthorne, W. 1998. Neostenanthera hamata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Neostenanthera hamata
